name: CatGull
description:
A seagull and a cat will work together to wreak havoc by destroying fish tanks in different houses.

 You control the seagull, but the cat will do whatever it wants with the first thing it finds!

Move the seagull with A and D, Flap by pressing the space bar.

Pick up your partner by holding down the W key while on top of him. If you release the key, you release the cat!

Only the cat is capable of moving objects and obstacles, if it wishes to do so! once your partner does something with an object, he will fall asleep. Pick it up again to wake him up!

Credits:

Main Artist:

Alvaro "Bastillas" Rocuant Cayo

Main Composer:

Main Coder:
